If all your sound settings are up, try going into a terminal and pressing the command "alsamixer" and check to make sure all your sound options are up.
It's a built in intel card on a Asus P5K premium wifi/ap
Did you restart your computer after you noticed sound disappeared?
try this in your terminal --> sudo /etc/init.d/alsa-utils restart
Some times it likes to crash and not start up so, now you know for future reference. :)
